snippet: The International Monetary Fund and edX have announced a collaboration to offer the fund’s training courses in macroeconomics and finance on the edX platform.
abstract: International Monetary Fund and edX, nonprofit e-learning venture, announce collaboration to offer fund's training courses in macroeconomics and finance on edX platform.
lead_paragraph: The International Monetary Fund and edX have announced a collaboration to offer the fund’s training courses in macroeconomics and finance on the edX platform.
